Articles.Content:
CHALLENGE:

Not really meant to be very difficult, but should be pretty fun nonetheless:

Build a rocket that's shaped like an asparagus! 

Extra Well DoneTM points will be awarded for taking this vegetable to interesting places...

 

CONDITIONS:

  • We all have to agree that it looks like an asparagus
  • It has to use Asparagus Staging (I'd suggest getting the Auto Asparagus Mod to help with this but in no way is it necessary)
  • It has to be able to fly.

 

Now go forth, members of the community, and do crazy things for ScienceTM!
Oh, and one more thing, mods ARE allowed as long as they don't contain any OP stuff or are used to cheat your asparagus to various places. If you use any mods then tell us
